question: Vainu Bappu Observatory is located in which district of Tamil Nadu?
explanation: The Vainu Bappu Observatory is owned and operated by the Indian Institute of Astrophysics. It is located at Kavalur in the Javadi Hills, near Vaniyambadi in Vellore district of Tamil Nadu. It is 200 km south-west of Chennai and 175 km south-east of Bangalore.
